title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a scarf in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a scarf in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that a vision: Wearing the hijab in a dream represents the collapse of fears and problems and obtaining lawful sustenance and money. This vision also indicates the happiness that the viewer sees in his life, as well as goodness and blessings, and the dreamer’s entry into new and familiar jobs. Seeing a scarf in a dream is an indication of permanent and future goodness and peace of life that the dreamer lives, and it also shows justice among people. Interpretation of seeing a scarf in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a scarf, this indicates the removal of her worries and the happiness that she will encounter in the future. Her life. Also, seeing a scarf or veil in a dream indicates her good condition, her piety, her religion, her faith in God Almighty, and her devotion to religion. This vision also indicates superiority, brilliant success, and a prominent position that unites and indicates the end of distress and distress, and God knows best. Seeing a scarf in a dream It indicates her close marriage to a just, high-ranking man and indicates that she will enter a new job. Interpretation of seeing a colored veil in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams of seeing or wearing a scarf, this indicates a successful and stable life, happiness and progress. This vision in a dream also indicates that she She will become pregnant soon and that she will achieve the goals and ambitions that she is trying to achieve. This vision also shows the removal of differences between her and her husband, closeness to God Almighty, and the absence of acts of disobedience or sin. Interpretation of seeing a scarf in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is buying a scarf and covering it, this means The diseases that she was suffering from will go away and her affairs will be facilitated. Also, seeing a scarf in a dream indicates the approaching date of childbirth and facilitating her birth by giving birth to a woman free of all diseases, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a scarf in a dream for a man: If you see a man in a dream seeing a scarf, this means that he will enter into a job. New and committed to religion and his close marriage to a good and loyal girl. This vision also shows the masters and abundance of sustenance, the abundance of money and livelihood that he earns from his trade and the gift of capital to his wife. This vision also indicates the death of sins and repentance for any immorality committed in the past, and the death of life’s problems. If A man saw that he was buying his wife’s scarf in a dream, which means that the disputes between him and his wife will be resolved, and God knows best. Interpretation of buying a scarf in a dream: The dream of buying a white veil for an unmarried girl is one of the dreams that indicate her imminent engagement or marriage to a suitable person. Also, the dream of buying a scarf Black indicates the fears and problems that the dreamer will suffer in his life. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of when the vision is real

preview.html: When the vision is real from the Moments website. I hope you find everything you are looking for and want and everything you benefit from our website. A series of fantasies that happen to a person during his sleep. These fantasies are called dreams. Scientists differ in their interpretation of the phenomenon of dreams. Some of them tried to prove that dreams are “a means used by the soul to satisfy its deep-rooted desires that are difficult to satisfy in the real world.” Sigmund Freud: When is a vision real? There is another type of dream, which comes to a person while he is awake, and these dreams are called “daydreams”, which are a type of mental wandering to think about a specific thing or problem that concerns him. Mind_mind. Not all dreams are self-talk, but there are dreams that the Messenger said were visions, and they are a dream or a message from God to His faithful servant.1. A dream is characterized by the symbolism of events, that is, a person dreams of something that has an interpretation (that is, he dreams of eating something, some kind of fruit, for example, and interprets it). As for satanic dreams, he does not associate them with symbolism (such as a woman dreaming that her husband is cheating on her with another woman). This is the type of dreams in which a person sees narrations of certain situations and events from Satan.2. The vision is not attributed to any person as certain conditions must be met in that person such as (honesty, honesty, piety, and closeness to God) because the vision only comes to the righteous servants of God. Prophecy)3. A dream that comes from Satan causes fear in a person. Satan always loves people’s sorrows, because it depicts something bad or evil in his house or one of his children or his wife, so the person wakes up afraid of the opposite. A dream that comes from God. God has mercy on His servants. He does not panic or make anyone sad, but a vision is a beloved thing that brings good news or warns against evil. One of the meanings of a vision is the speed with which the narrator remembers it when he narrates it to a specific person, so that the vision with all its details is imprinted in his memory and he will never forget it. How does a person deal with With the vision and dealing with the dream? If a person sees a good dream and wants to interpret it, he should not talk about it to those who hate him or harbor malice and malice, but rather resort to those who specialize in interpreting dreams and praise God for this dream if it is so. good. To keep this evil away from him. In the case of a dream, if a person wakes up from a dream that frightens him, he must seek refuge from Satan, change his sleep to the other side, and pray to God to keep him away from Satan’s evil and conspiracy. .

title: Interpretation of a dream about a king marrying a married woman in a dream according to the most famous interpretation scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a king marrying a married woman in a dream by the most famous scholars of interpretation, as this dream can tempt many people who are curious to know the interpretations and meanings contained in these dreams, such dreams contain many interpretations and interpretations that may be good, and useful to the person, and may not be good, and in this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about marrying a king to a married woman in a dream by the most famous scholars. From the interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a king’s wedding for a married woman in a dream Seeing this dream for a married woman is one of the visions that arouse curiosity to know its interpretations and meanings, as it can bring her good and happy news or it can be warning messages for her, and in this we put it for you. Interpretation of a dream about a king’s wedding for a married woman in a dream is also: This dream is evidence of the journey that will happen in this woman’s life. She will also see many difficult things in life, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams that she wants to marry the king and she is very happy. This dream is a sign of success in a certain matter in life. It also indicates the happiness of this woman and her family. If she sees that the king wants to marry her, and this is done without her consent, and she does not want that. She regrets the next period in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing horses in a dream for a married and single woman in detail Interpretation of marriage from the king to the single As this vision is present in the dreams of many girls, especially those who are going to get married, and they think about it constantly, and this vision carries many different interpretations and interpretations, and in this context we learn about the interpretation of marriage from a king to a single woman, it is also: If an unmarried girl sees that The king wants to marry her, she was very happy. It is a sign and evidence that this girl's wedding is approaching, and she will be happy about it. But it will take a long time to reach this point. If the unmarried woman sees that the king was her relative, and she wanted to marry her, and she did not agree. It shows that they will be in a lot of trouble in the near future. Also, this girl should resort to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gloomy person in a dream for single, married, pregnant women and men Interpretation of a dream about marrying an angel for a pregnant woman Of course, the interpretations contained in dreams differ from one person to another, as they differ according to the psychological and social state of the dreamer, and in this context we explain to you. Interpretation of a dream about marrying an angel for a pregnant woman is also: If the pregnant woman dreams that her husband wants to marry the king and she leaves him. It is a sign and evidence that this woman will face many problems during this period, and it will put a lot of pressure on her. But soon she will get rid of these problems, God Almighty willing. If the pregnant woman sees that she wants to marry the king and is happy about it. The dream indicates that she will give birth to a male, and she will be very happy with him. See also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a mute and deaf person in a dream for a married woman Single Interpretation of a dream about marrying a queen for a man Perhaps this vision is good news

title: Interpretation of the dream of the letter Z in a dream by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: The dream interpretation of the letter Ya in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. The interpretation of the letters that Al-Nabulsi mentioned in the interpretation book that he presented to the specialist is appropriate, in addition to the other names that you see in a dream in abundance with their meanings and interpretations. Which explains the interpretation of dreams for the appropriate letter in a dream in a dream in the world from the Nabulsi tide. The hand in a dream shows generosity and many good deeds. A dream about Yahya in Al-Nabulsi: The letter Ya is dreamed of in a dream, but our master Yahya, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream is a symbol of piety, faith, immunity from sins and immorality, and good news for everyone, God Almighty willing. And God knows best. As for seeing our master Yunus, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream, it is one of the signs that indicate making quick decisions. A dream of our master Yaqoub al-Nabulsi: Seeing our master Yaqub, may God bless him and grant him peace, means strength and nourishment, and therefore, polygamy and many children is a great sadness. Followed by more joy and a sign of obedience. And commitment. A dream about the letter Ya in a dream, and this indicates multiple trips and high prices, and God knows best. A dream about the Prophet Joseph from Nabulsi: A dream about the letter Ya in a dream. As for the interpretation of seeing our Master Joseph in a dream, it is a sign of the usurpation of power, influence, and ownership. Because it indicates exposure to many... Of difficulties, challenges and heartaches. He lost money, children, family and soul and suffered from serious injustice. The letter Z is dreamed in a dream, but he will receive a great blessing and many means of sustenance and compensation from God Almighty. Who knows how to travel and get out of tyranny. Jasmine in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: You dream of the letter Z in A dream, and so jasmine is one of the symbols that signify joy, happiness, and many good events. It is close to fears, loss, unhappiness and pain, the good news of marriage in a young man’s dream, and many good things. What is the interpretation of seeing a hand in a dream? Seeing a hand in a dream indicates generosity And generosity and many good deeds. Seeing the left hand speaking indicates quarrels and conflict with parents. Seeing a closed or closed hand indicates neglect and miserliness. Seeing the loss of a hand indicates the loss of a brother or friend. Dreaming of the letter Ya in a dream Seeing yourself walking with your hands also indicates Relying on a brother or friend. What is the interpretation of seeing rubies in a dream? Dreaming of the letter Z in a dream Rubies indicate good news and good luck. Seeing red rubies also indicates beautiful women. It also symbolizes joys and pleasures. Rubies also indicate one woman who is engaged and achieves Her desires in life. Interpretation of waking up in a dream. Whoever sees that someone is waking him up in a dream. Dreaming of the letter Z in a dream indicates guidance on the right path. Seeing yourself awake in dreams symbolizes a long life. Commitment to work and following up on all matters. Interpretation of seeing jaundice in Dreams: Seeing jaundice in a dream symbolizes a person’s bad choice or inappropriate clothing. Dreaming of the letter Z in a dream also indicates a bad choice of a husband. Interpretation of seeing the truth. Whoever sees this in a dream swears a false oath.

title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing ihram for a man and a woman

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about wearing ihram in a dream is one of the good interpretations that the dreamer is satisfied with, but it differs from one person to another depending on the details of the vision and according to the dreamer’s condition as well. . Senior scholars have interpreted the dream of wearing the Ihram and its various occasions. In the following lines, we will discuss both the interpretation of the dream of wearing the Ihram in a dream for a single woman, as well as for married women, as well as the meaning of the interpretation of a dream about my husband wearing the Ihram, so follow us. Interpretation of the dream of wearing the Ihram, seeing the Ihram dress in a dream, It means that the dreamer is walking on the straight path, and living it with the satisfaction of God Almighty. Seeing wearing the ihram in a dream indicates the arrival of sustenance, joy, and happiness. Seeing wearing the ihram in a dream symbolizes changing the situation for the better and feeling reassured. Seeing the ihram at a time that is not the time for Hajj in a dream, It may symbolize poverty, but according to the symbols of the dream. Seeing Ihram clothes in a dream for an unmarried or unmarried woman is good news of the approaching marriage, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about wearing Ihram in a dream can indicate a long life. Wearing Ihram clothes in a dream for a dead person, which was black Color, and visiting the Kaaba may indicate the dead person’s need to pay off his debts. Seeing the dead person wearing Ihram clothes in a dream is good news for his condition in the afterlife. Also, seeing the dead person wearing the Ihram dress and its red color symbolizes his need for supplication and charity. See also: Going to Umrah In a dream, interpretation of Hajj in a dream. Ihram clothing in a dream. Seeing a man wearing Ihram in a dream indicates God’s help for him and increased blessings in his money and children. Seeing a man wearing Ihram in a dream may indicate paying off his debt and resolving his crises. Seeing a man wearing Ihram clothing in a dream indicates stability. His married life and his distance from problems and disputes. Interpretation of wearing Ihram clothes in a prisoner’s dream is happy news of comfort and relief. Seeing Ihram clothes for a pregnant woman on her bed indicates that she will soon give birth to a healthy child. Interpretation of dreams: Wearing Ihram clothes for a pregnant woman and being happy with her, is good news that her husband will give her a surprise that will make her happy. It indicates Seeing colored Ihram clothes in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates obstacles and problems in pregnancy and childbirth. Ihram clothes in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of Ihram clothes in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the transition of insight into a new life, God willing. Seeing white Ihram clothes in a dream for an unmarried woman can indicate Also to the purity of her heart and her husband’s care for morals and religion. Seeing forbidden clothes in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes the release of worries and the death of sorrows in the girl’s life. Seeing wearing ihram clothes in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman wearing ihram in a dream may indicate her husband’s approval of her. It could Seeing white Ihram clothes in a dream for a married woman indicates that she fears God and is pleased with Him. Interpretation of Ihram clothes in a dream for a married woman indicates freedom from anxiety and stability in her life. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a perforated tooth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about pierced teeth for a single woman. Interpretation of a vision: A new, pierced molar in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that she will soon marry someone she wants. Also, seeing blood coming out of a molar in a dream indicates the presence of many haters and envious people in her life. Also, seeing teeth falling out in a dream For an unmarried woman, it is a sign of removing her worries and getting rid of her problems. Seeing a perforated tooth in a dream for a girl indicates the presence of disabled people around her during this period. Interpretation of a dream about a perforated tooth for a married woman: Seeing a perforated tooth in a dream for a married woman indicates some psychological and marital problems that She suffers from it in her life. Also, a woman’s dream of having her tooth extracted is evidence that she will face many difficulties during this period. Also, seeing a hole in the teeth in a married woman’s dream is a sign of a lot of good and ample nutrition that she will gain soon. Interpretation of a dream about a holed tooth for a woman Pregnant woman: The interpretation of seeing a hole in the teeth in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she is suffering from some fears regarding pregnancy and childbirth. The appearance of a new tooth in a dream for a pregnant woman is good news, great sustenance, and care for a good child, free from all diseases. A falling tooth in a pregnant woman’s dream is One of the dreams that some interpreters describe as undesirable. Dream interpretation of a hole between the front teeth: Seeing a rotten or perforated tooth in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will be exposed to an illness in his next life. Also, cleaning a perforated tooth in a dream is good news, healing, and relief from worries. And anxiety. Seeing a damaged tooth in a dream is one of the unwanted dreams that means that the dreamer will fall into misfortunes. A rotten tooth in an unmarried girl’s dream means that he thinks a lot about the future and her attachment to some things. Also, seeing a pierced tooth in a dream for a man indicates some worries. And the sorrows that hinder his life at this time. Interpretation of a dream about swollen teeth in a dream: The interpretation of seeing a swollen tooth in a dream indicates some of the difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life. Also, losing a tooth in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the death of one of the people close to the dreamer. It indicates Lower jaw teeth falling out in a dream indicates that the dreamer will fall into misfortunes, sorrows, anxiety and distress. preview.html: Do dreams often come true? In a dream, do recurring dreams come true? In a dream via the vision website roy2a.com, seeing the dream repeated in a dream indicates a lot of confusion, hesitation, fear of the future, lack of confidence in oneself or those around him, and repetition of the place. In a dream or repeating someone in a dream can indicate a lot of thinking and preoccupation with that person. With this, and we will explain in this article, do recurring dreams come true? In a dream, the man, the unmarried young man, the unmarried woman, as well as the married and divorced woman of some imams such as Imam Ibn Shirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other interpreters in the modern era, so follow us on the Ruya website. Recurring dreams come true in a dream of Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing recurring dreams in a dream means fear And hesitation. Seeing a person in a dream repeatedly in a dream indicates preoccupation with this person or fear of him, as he may have some role in harming the dreamer or fear of harming him. Dreaming of a recurring dream in a specific place indicates rejection of reality and nostalgia for past memories. Recurring dreams Do recurring dreams come true in a single woman’s dream? The repetition of a dream in a single woman’s dream indicates fear of the future, fear of the unknown, hesitation, and anxiety. If an unmarried girl sees a dream that repeats itself with her, this indicates her resolve and determination to overcome difficulties and fight hard to achieve her goal. Do recurring dreams come true in a single woman’s dream? A dream about a married woman? Dreaming about recurring dreams in a dream about a married woman indicates the worries, problems, and disagreements that a married woman is exposed to and she cannot find appropriate solutions or cannot change reality. A married woman may see people and see them repeatedly, or places that she often sees in her dream. This indicates that she moves to another place or sees the person she sees, and perhaps she is preoccupied with what she sees and thus her dream is repeated. Do recurring dreams come true in a pregnant woman’s dream? If a pregnant woman sees that someone is repeating herself in a dream, this indicates fear and anxiety about a troubled birth. A dream of a pregnant woman who repeats a dream indicates the safety of the mother and baby and the ease of childbirth. Do recurring dreams come true in a pregnant woman’s dream? A divorced woman’s dream? If a divorced woman sees a dream that repeats itself in her dream, this indicates fear of the unknown and a lot of hesitation and anxiety. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband in a dream, this indicates her return to him, or the dream may indicate her fear of returning to him, and the dream is only an expression. About the subconscious mind and a lot of thinking about the past. What does it mean to repeat a dream in the same place? A dream that repeats a place in a dream shows the bad psychological state that the dreamer is going through. Seeing a specific place in the dreamer’s dream that is constantly repeated indicates the number of complications that the dreamer is going through and imposing his opinion. And control and control over those around him. What does repeating a dream with the same person mean? Repeating a dream in a person’s dream indicates many problems and psychological pressures. Repeating a dream may indicate that the person is preoccupied with

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing winter in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing winter in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Winter is known as the rainy season, and if the dream was actually in winter and was accompanied by light, harmless rain, they see it as a sad dream, as heavy rain in winter suggests loneliness and isolation, and stress and light rain indicate the fulfillment of desires and overcoming Difficulties, such as the winter scene looks very good to the forerunner and food due to the presence of rain. It also indicates positive changes. Dream of seeing winter in a dreamIf someone dreams of a rainy winter, then this is a victory and a good life for you. If there is no lightning or annoying appearance when it rains, good things It happens to you. The interpretation of a dream about heavy rain hides it and hinders the achievement of your goals. If it rains heavily, this means that you will face problems. Winter rain is not considered a bad thing. Snowfall in the winter is good for you, and if the dream is in the summer, then your vision is not good, because this is a warning For a man, a dream of seeing winter means living in isolation in the winter of modern depression, instead of mingling with others. People who dream of winter are rejected or ignored by others. This means that you are bored or your feelings are repressed and others do not feel them. The best interpretation of a dream about winter is to work well. With friends or family. A dream of seeing winter for a married woman. A dream of seeing winter for a married woman is better for Ibn Shaheen, but today psychologists and translators have found that it indicates that you are indifferent or worried about pregnancy because you are not ready at the moment. Then your husband may put pressure on you or your family to have children Your physical and psychological condition is not good and indicates that investigation is required. In terms of warmth and self-affirmation, perhaps your husband is dry and does not say warm words that make you feel safe. A dream of seeing winter by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen talked about understanding winter, which is a mercy from God Almighty. It is very good and sustainable, because it rains in winter and rainwater flows on the ground and the water level is high. People drink and raise animals. But he said the tension can be very high because in some countries it can be accompanied by heavy rains and strong hurricanes. Ibn Shaheen said that winter means kingship, which could mean that many people have the upper hand, for example. In management or leadership. Situations.Dream of seeing winter for a single womanSeeing winter and summer in a dream for a single woman can be a good thing.It indicates a better life, the fulfillment of desires, and the fulfillment of desires.Winter also indicates a happy marriage, peace, and stability for single people.The vision also indicates his association with a person of good character.What If a single woman sees rain in her home and is happy. This is a good indicator and shows strong feelings towards the person and his relationship with marriage. The vision also indicates the fulfillment of desires, wealth and wealth. Also, seeing rain on an unmarried woman indicates that someone is proposing to her and wants to marry her and she will be happy. With him. Winter in a dream shows good deeds and keeping away from sins. It also indicates avoiding forbidden things, but if he sees that winter is approaching

title: Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a woman married to a strange man in a dream about a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a woman married to a strange man. Some believe that dreams foretell the future, and therefore they attach great importance to the interpretation of dreams. Sharia law divides dreams into considering them as mere fantasies in the subconscious mind, and they are expressed in the form of dreams as well. Regarding them as pipes of Satan one should not happen, as well as consider them as true declared visions. God is His true servants, and in this article we talk about it. Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a woman married to a strange man. Interpretation of marriage in a dream for a single girl. Single girls may have many dreams, including the dream of marriage, and perhaps this is the result of the idea of ​​marriage and their desire to achieve this dream before reaching the age without marriage. In this article, we talk about the interpretation of marriage in a single girl’s dream: If an unmarried girl sees that she is marrying a strange man whom she does not know and does not approach him except through his marriage and celebrations, then this indicates good visions that portend goodness and success in the life of the fortuneteller. If a girl sees in her dream that she She wears a wedding dress and marries her groom, with music being present and the wedding ceremony being performed, this means that something bad will happen to the dreamer. To marry in a dream a man whom the dreamer knows, this indicates goodness that will happen to her from this man, and this does not mean that she will marry him in reality. And whoever sees That he is marrying someone he knows and loves in reality, so this dream is just a wish and the dreamer dreams about him often, and this in turn is reflected in her dreams. And whoever sees in a dream that he is marrying an animal, he will marry a man who has the characteristics of that animal. If a girl sees that she is marrying a foreigner whom she does not know This may indicate the death of the monarch. If the girl sees that someone has proposed to her, this is a sign of the woman’s good fortune in this life. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is marrying her father and has a good relationship with him, this is evidence of the father’s satisfaction, kindness, and success in life. The fortune teller. If the relationship is bad, she must honor her father so that he does not become angry with her. When an unmarried girl sees her wedding dress lost in her dream, this is evidence that her marriage will be delayed, and wearing a tight dress or shoes is evidence of her marriage to an inappropriate man. See also : I dreamed that I was catching a fish, interpretation of a dream about fishing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a woman married to a strange man from Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin explained the interpretation of a dream about marriage in a dream for a married woman, which has many interpretations and connotations, which could be good news or a warning and a warning to her. . Then we explain the interpretation of a dream about marriage in a dream about a married woman according to Ibn Sirin: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is marrying a strange man, this is a sign of goodness and benefit for her and her family. And whoever sees in a dream that he is marrying a foreigner and has a male son, this is evidence of the marriage of that son. Whoever sees that she has married a strange man and he has consummated the marriage with her, this is evidence of severe illness and the nearness of the term. And whoever sees that she is getting married in a dream, this is evidence of kindness and intimate relationship between them, and the relationship of love, friendship, and understanding between the spouses. Whoever sees that she is marrying her father and he died.

title: What is the interpretation of sleep in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Sleeping in a dream: The space for interpretations related to sleeping in a dream is expanding because it is governed by multiple criteria that depend on the social status of the dreamer, the nature of the dream, and the condition in which the person sleeps if he is lying on his back. . Or your stomach or the interpretation of your dream without hesitation or confusion. Sleeping in a dreamYou can accurately determine the interpretation of your dream if you remember the details of what you saw in the dream and the situation in which you slept. He went through many problems and obstacles that drained his energy, but he was able to overcome them in the end and get out of them safely to return again to a state of stability and psychological peace, while lying on his stomach in a dream reflects negatively. Concepts such as illness, exhaustion, and the inability to continue the struggle in middle age. Waking up in a dream after a long sleep and feeling rested and energetic represents new beginnings and positive changes that will enter the dreamer’s life and make it better and more influential. If he intends to enter into a project, he will plan it with ease and intelligence that will characterize it with success. Sleeping peacefully in a dream indicates God’s good character and enjoyment. With morals and purity of intentions in dealing with everything, while feeling anxious and tense all the time and weak, the rest reveals the problems that surround the viewer in reality. Sleeping in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that sleeping in a dream carries many interpretations depending on the circumstances of the viewer and the details of what he sees in the dream. Without the ability to respond and wake up, it expresses excessive physical exhaustion and psychological discomfort, which is what actually happens. Sleeping on the left side in a dream reveals major problems and successive crises that enter the dreamer’s life and deprive him of a feeling of stability and psychological comfort. He should regularly intend to repent and start over by avoiding evil and doing good deeds. Sleeping in Nabulsi’s Dream Nabulsi explains in his interpretation of sleeping in a dream that the aspect of interpretation extends to this point depending on how one sleeps and how one feels upon waking up. The dreamer finally feels peace of mind and relaxation after many difficult situations and stifling crises. Sleeping for long hours without paying attention to the conversations of those close to him shows the dreamer’s desire to escape from problems and not to integrate the responsibilities and pressures that surround him in reality and require constant presence. Part of his life is incomplete without guiding the right path. He sleeps in a dream of Imam Al-SadiqAccording to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of sleep in a dream, a dreamer who enters a deep sleep and the presence of someone close to him who tries to wake him up in various ways indicates that he wants to lead you on the path of kindness. Guiding and wishing you good conditions, and sleeping for long hours without feeling comfortable or appropriate, indicates the dreamer’s shortcomings in his responsibilities, and his failure to fulfill some of the promises he made to those close to him, that is, it represents the feeling in the dream and the details of what he saw. There is a big difference in interpretation. In addition to that The spread of drowsiness among a person in the workplace indicates that he is bored with what he is doing and has a strong desire to make a change and get out of the same situation.
